thing-type.label: Command
thing-type.description: The Command encapsulates a shell command to be executed

parameter.name: transform
parameter.label: Transform
parameter.description: The transformation to apply on the execution result, e.g. REGEX((.*))

parameter.name: interval
parameter.label: Interval
parameter.description: Interval, in seconds, the command will be repeatedly executed. The minimum value is 1 second

parameter.name: timeout
parameter.label: Timeout
parameter.description: Time out, in seconds, the execution of the command will time out

parameter.name: runOnInput
parameter.label: Run On Input
parameter.description: When true, the command will execute each time a Command is received on the input channel

parameter.name: repeatEnabled
parameter.label: Repeat Enabled
parameter.description: When true, the command will execute on any Command that is received on the input channel, even if not different from a previous Command received on the input channel. If false, then the command will be executed if the Command received on the input channel is different from the previously received Command

channel-type.label: Exit Value
channel-type.description: The exit value of the last execution of the command

channel-type.label: Run
channel-type.description: Send ON to execute the command and the current state tells whether it is running or not

channel-type.label: Last Execution
channel-type.description: Time/Date the command was last executed, in yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ format
